triples.name: Information retrieval
triples.relevance: The core task of web search that WSDM focuses on as part of search and data mining research.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: One of the primary problem areas discussed at WSDM for extracting patterns from large datasets.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: Discussed in George Karypis keynote as an important research area at AWS AI for handling graph-structured data.

triples.name: Knowledge distillation
triples.relevance: Referenced in Yejin Choi's keynote on symbolic knowledge distillation and knowledge compression techniques.

triples.name: Commonsense reasoning
triples.relevance: Part of Yejin Choi's keynote on commonsense morality and reasoning in AI systems.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Mentioned in Yejin Choi's keynote regarding multimodal script knowledge processing.

triples.name: Ethics of artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Core topic of Ricardo Baeza-Yates' keynote on ethics challenges in AI that the WSDM community addresses.
